explanation: The bug was in the line 'dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1] + xl[i] + yl[j]'. It should be using 'yl[j-1]' instead of 'yl[j]' because the list 'yl' is 0-indexed and 'j' can equal 'i' in the loop, causing an index out of range error when accessing 'yl[j]'. The corrected line is now 'dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1] + xl[i] + yl[j-1]'.
